body_html: While I agree that extra complexity is generally bad, shouldn't the user be allowed to change things if they want? For example, it could not be exposed in any of the examples, but documented for those who want fast prototyping with performance.
body_text: While I agree that extra complexity is generally bad, shouldn't the user be allowed to change things if they want? For example, it could not be exposed in any of the examples, but documented for those who want fast prototyping with performance.
body: While I agree that extra complexity is generally bad, shouldn't the user be _allowed_ to change things if they want? For example, it could not be exposed in any of the examples, but documented for those who want fast prototyping with performance.
